DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study investigate high-intensity resistance training induce additional beneficial effect , patient moderate severe long term pain neck , add multidisciplinary treatment program .
DOC.brief_title: Effects Resistance Training Pain , Function Work Ability Patients With Moderate Severe Neck Pain
DOC.criteria: Referred multidisciplinary clinic treatment pain neck Long term ( ≥ 3months ) recurrent ( ≥ 2 period ≥ 4 week past year ) nonspecific neck pain , Pain intensity ≥ 4 numerical rating scale ( 010 ) Severe somatic condition ( unstable injury , malignity , infectious disease , active rheumatic disease , severe osteoporosis ) Psychiatric condition/disease severely impairs group function Insufficient comprehension Norwegian language participate group session fill questionnaire Awaiting surgery neck Alcohol drug abuse Ongoing compensation case apply disability benefit due pain neck Engaged highintensity resistance training regular basis last 6 month Contraindications highintensity resistance training ( i.e . shoulder complication )
